extendedInfo.description: PushOn UCCW Skin includes 2 matching UCCW widgets styles that can be used with the PushOn skin and icon pack which is available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.esethnet.pushon -----------------This is not a standalone app. You need to download UCCW (free) from Google Play before you install this app. Widgets included in the app are: Clock and Weather.-----------------How to apply the widget?1. Press and Hold on the homescreen and tap on widgets.2. Scroll to UCCW Widgets and tap on 1x1, 2x2, 3x3 or 4x4 for Clock and 2x1, 3x1, 3x2, 4x1, 4x2 for Weather.3. Scroll and select the PushOn Widget you like.-----------------Editable HotspotsAll widgets by default open up the hotspot edit screen upon click. After applying the widget you can tap on the widget to open the HotSpot Edit screen and customize the hotspot.To save the hotspot:1. Tap on Widget, Under HotSpot 1 pick a Hotspot type. 2. Click Menu - Lock widgets (HotSpot mode)3. Tap on On-----------------If you have any icon request or questions then feel free to email me at gseth83@gmail.com

reviews.title: Great clock!
reviews.comment: This clock and weather uccw widget are clean, yet functional. It also looks slick, yet simple!
reviews.author: Jason Taylor
